DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate diagnostic yield safety transbronchial lung biopsy ( TBLB ) cryoprobe versus conventional forceps patient diffuse lung disease .
DOC.brief_title: Diagnostic Yield Safety Transbronchial Lung Biopsy Using Cryoprobes Versus Conventional Forceps . A Multicenter Study
DOC.criteria: > 18 year old Patients diffuse lung disease candidate study transbronchial lung biopsy ( TBLB ) . Inform consent sign . FEV1 < 40 % reference value . Respiratory insufficiency ( pO2 < 60 mmHg pCO2 > 45 mmHg ) . Use anticoagulant therapy presence coagulation ( disorder abnormal platelet count , international normalize ratio > 1.5 ) . Bullous emphysema . Pulmonary arterial hypertension . Hypersensitivity anaesthetic sedative drug ( lidocaine , midazolam , propofol , remifentanyl ) . Psychiatric illness . Comorbidities could increase risk TBLB . Pregnancy .
